nodes.text: The Mandalorian Season Three is the upcoming third season of the American web television series The Mandalorian. Series executive producer and writer Jon Favreau told Variety that The Mandalorian was on schedule to begin production before the end of 2020. According to Phil Szostak, the Lucasfilm Ltd. art department began concept art production in November 2019, days before the launch of the first season. The season is set to premiere in Spring 2022.
